tool_description: Retrieves comprehensive medical history for a patient including current conditions, allergies, and active medications from EHR systems.

patient_id.description: Unique patient identifier in the EHR system

include_conditions.description: Whether to include current medical conditions

error_messages: Patient not found: The provided patient_id does not exist in the system. Verify the patient ID is correct.
Access denied: Insufficient permissions to access this patient's records. Ensure proper authorization.
EHR system unavailable: Unable to connect to electronic health records system. Try again later.
usage: Provide a valid patient_id to retrieve medical history. Optionally specify which data types to include using the boolean flags.
